title: Leaver Buster 3 Times in A Row Without Putting me Into a Match
body: Okay, so I got leaver buster because wifi crashed. Received 20 minute leaver buster. Went into queue again, waited 20 minutes, leaver buster timer just restarts. Got sick and fed up of waiting. Look at screenshot (in link; top right corner, amount of time spent waiting in queue, shows that I didn't leave in the middle of waiting. Please fix Rito.

replies.body: I would definitely shoot this screenshot over to our techs in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new). They'll want to walk you through some steps in our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to make sure your network will allow you to make it through the whole match, but it does look like you waited the amount of time you were meant to. Hopefully they'll be able to do something about this after a little troubleshooting!
